Some things you can do instead of smoking: 
• Get a massage or pedicure 
• Walk the dog, or your pet giraffe, tiger, whatever 
• Yoga/Pilates, Tae Kwon Do or Ju Jitsu or Kung Fu 
• Deep breathing or meditation, zen it up 
• stretch tense muscles, go to the gym 
• Learn to cook something new 
• Stimulate your senses with aroma therapy 
• Visualize your success and everything you can do in better health 
• Get outside, it's a great day and you might be missing it 
• Take up a new hobby, anything from painting to kick boxing. 
• Play a sport 
• Slow down adn enjoy the day - do not rush 
• Drink more water and eat more veggies 
 Reward yourself for not smoking! 
• Use your money saved for that new movie, outfit, game, restaurant, anything else. It adds up! 
 Crush a workout to kill that stress! 
 Exercise is a great way to: 
• Burn calories 
• Raise your metabolism 
• Reduce stress and tension 
• Enhance oxygen consumption 
• Increase energy 
• Improve your sleep 
• Improve your libido 
• Enhance self-esteem 
• Strengthen your heart and lungs 
• Decrease your risk of heart disease and stroke 

 In many ways working out is a lot like smoking. Except it will not cause cancer, emphysema or heart disease, yeah! 

Check out quitrunchil.org. Running is as effective as the patch to help people quit smoking.
